author: smuzaffar
body:
- Added unit test for `BeautifulSoup` python package. It is used by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/Utilities/StaticAnalyzers/scripts/postprocess-scan-build.py only. Unit tests makes sure that we can catch the errors at build/update time.
- Cleaned up local copy of  `BeautifulSoup` from cmssw ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/Documentation/ReferenceManualScripts/python/BeautifulSoup.py ) and use it from `py3-beautifulsoup4`
title: Added py3-beautifulsoup unittest
